name: Passing By
storyline:
Set in a beautiful low-poly world of floating isles and a never-ceasing west wind, Passing By allows you to embark on a memorable journey as Curly, a young balloonist, who is tasked with delivering a mysterious letter.

In this genre hybrid of 2D puzzle platformer, survival game and adventure, you can explore the world at your own leisure, travelling from island to island via balloon ship and solving various puzzles while having to manage your resources in order to survive. An exciting adventure awaits you!

But remember: since the west wind only ever blows in one direction, once you decide to leave an island, this means goodbye for good. Think carefully before you board your balloon ship - are you prepared to make the long trip through the clouds towards an unknown destination?

"The journey is its own reward. May your burner always warm you and the west wind ever favour you!"
summary:
Passing By is a genre hybrid of 2D puzzle platformer, survival game and adventure. Players travel via balloon ship to explore a world full of floating islands. On their journey, they meet quirky island inhabitants and fellow travellers while solving various puzzles and managing their resources in order to survive. Passing By is a non-violent game and conveys a wholesome and whimsical atmosphere.

In 2021, Passing By won the Young Talent Award: Best Prototype at the German Computer Games Awards, as well as the Ubisoft Newcomer Award at the German Developer Awards.
